ai_explanation:
The AI system followed these steps to generate its recommendation:

  1. Gather candidate recipes;
  2. Tag ingredients (zucchini noodles: vegetable+gluten-free, basil: leafy, tomato sauce: vegetable base);
  3. Drop any with gluten, meat, fish, gelatin, or animal rennet;
  4. Compute score = 0.4·vegetarian_flag + 0.25·normalized_protein + 0.2·leafy_flag + 0.1·dairy_flag + 0.05·normalized_fiber;
  5. Sort by score. Top recipe: “Zucchini noodles with tomato basil sauce.”
